OnMobile Asia Pacific Pvt Ltd 
OnMobile is a fast growing company that was spun-off from Infosys 
Technologies Limited (NASD: INFY). 

Onmobile combines the entrepreneurial spirit of a start-up with the 
experience and domain expertise of an established telecommunications 
software company.

Onmobile is headquartered in Silicon Valley, CA with the development 
centre located in Bangalore.

WHAT DO WE DO?
OnMobile is a leading provider of integrated voice and data solutions 
to Wireless Carriers and Enterprises worldwide. 

Our innovative, leading-edge Multimodal platform product is an 
industry first. Our product combines Advanced Speech Recognition 
technologies with unique capabilities of a mobile phone such as SMS, 
MMS and Location to host applications that are easy-to-use and 
compelling to users.

In addition to our Multimodal platform product, we offer a suite of 
multimodal applications that have redefined and revolutionized the 
value added services deployed by wireless operators. 

OnMobile Multimodal platform and applications have been deployed by 
several leading Cellular Operators.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?
Our strength lies in the ability to produce excellent software and in 
keeping up with the momentum of continuous innovation. Since we are 
growing at a rapid pace, we are looking at people, who can take 
challenges and can produce results to lead them on a quick career 
growth path. We are committed to offering the best work environment, 
remuneration and job opportunities in the IT industry.

For more information, visit www.onmobile.com 
Designation 	QA Engineer 
Job Description 	Job includes Designing and developing the 
Test Plans and strategy for performing black box testing of multi-
modal applications for wireless devices. Will include test execution, 
software verification, defect identification, analysis and reporting. 
Desired Profile 	Mandatory Requirements:
Minimum of 1 year of software quality assurance experience.
Engineering from a reputed university with good academic record (Pls 
mention the Percentage of Marks obtained in X, XII and Degree).
Should have strong test planning skills and good analysis and problem 
solving abilities.
Must have understanding of SQA methodology and testing techniques.
Must be self-motivated and comfortable working in a dynamic 
environment. 
Good verbal and written English communication skills.

Advantages:
Experience in testing voice-based applications.
Experience in WAP, VoIP, XML, VXML.
Experience in C/C++ or Java. 
Minimum experience 	1 year 
Maximum experience 	2 years 
Industry Type:	Software Services
Functional Area:	Software Development - QA and Testing
Levels :	Junior Management
Location 	Bangalore 
Reference 	QA/07/03 
Contact 	Kavitha Rao
